eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
(r^\mp_l)^t\cdot r^\mp_l  + \lambda^\pm_l& =&  r^\mp_{l+1}\cdot
(r^\mp_{l+1})^t +
\lambda^\pm_{l+1} \equiv h^\pm_l,\quad l = 1,\ldots,N-1\nonumber\\
 (r^\mp_{N})^t \cdot r^\mp_{N} + \lambda^\pm_{N}& =& h^\pm \equiv h^\pm_N,\nonumber\\
r^\mp_1 \cdot (r^\mp_1)^t  + \lambda^\pm_1& =&  h^\mp \equiv h^\pm_0,
\label{chain}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
q^+_N \cdot q^-_N &=& (r^-_N)^t \cdots (r^-_1)^t\cdot r^-_1 \cdots r^-_N =
(r^-_N)^t
\cdots (r^-_{2})^t (h^+_{1} - \lambda^+_1) r^-_{2} \cdots r^-_N\nonumber\\
&=&  (r^-_N)^t \cdots (r^-_{2})^t \cdot r^-_{2}  \cdots r^-_N
(h^+  - \lambda^+_1)
= \cdots =  (h^+ - \lambda^+_1)\cdots (h^+ - \lambda^+_N)
\nonumber\\
&=& \mbox{\rm det} \left[E{\bf I}-{\bf S}^{+}\right]_{E = h^+};\nonumber\\
q^-_N \cdot q^+_N &=& r^-_1 \cdots r^-_N \cdot (r^-_N)^t \cdots (r^-_1)^t =
r^-_1 \cdots r^-_{N-1} (h^+_{N-1} - \lambda^+_N) (r^-_{N-1})^t \cdots
(r^-_1)^t\nonumber\\
&=& \cdots =  (h^- - \lambda^+_1)\cdots (h^- - \lambda^+_N)
= {\rm det} \left[E{\bf I}-{\bf S}^{+}\right]_{E = h^-}.
\label{trsusy}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&&\psi (x)|_{x \rightarrow -\infty} \longrightarrow
\exp(ik_{in}x) + R(k_{in})\exp(-ik_{in}x),\nonumber\\
&&\psi(x)|_{x \rightarrow +\infty} \longrightarrow
\left(1 + T(k_{out})\right)\exp(ik_{out}x),
\

\begin{eqnarray}
V_{1,2} &=& \chi^2 \mp \chi' =
\mp 2f' + f^2 + \frac{f''}{2f} - \left(\frac{f'}{2f}\right)^2 -
\frac{d}{4f^2} -a,\nonumber\\
\tilde b &=& f^2 - \frac{f''}{2f} +\left(\frac{f'}{2f}\right)^2 +
\frac{d}{4f^2},
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&&\{K^{(\zeta)}, K^{(\zeta)\dagger}\} = H^2 + (2a + \zeta^2) H + a^2 + d
+ 2 \zeta G_0 = (H + a_\zeta)^2  + d_\zeta,\nonumber\\
&& a_\zeta = a + \frac12 \zeta^2,\quad
d_\zeta = d + 2 \zeta G_0 - a \zeta^2 - \frac14 \zeta^4
\equiv - \Phi_4 (- \frac{\zeta}{2}),
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&&\{Q, \bar Q_c\} =  \tilde{\cal P}_N (H)
- \tilde{\cal P}_{N_1} (H) + i 2{\cal B} (H),\label{2susy1}\\
&&\{Q_c, \bar Q\} =  \tilde{\cal P}_N (H)
- \tilde{\cal P}_{N_1} (H) -i 2 {\cal B} (H), \label{2susy2}\\
&&\bar Q_c = Q^t =
K^\dagger + i P^\dagger;\quad  Q_c = Q^* =
K - i P;\quad \bar Q =
K^\dagger - i P^\dagger. \label{2def}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\{Q_i, \bar Q_j\} &=& \left[({\bf I}+ \tau_1) \left((H + a)^2 + d \right)
+({\bf I}- \tau_1) c^2 H\right. \nonumber\\
&&\left. - \tau_2\, 2c G_0 -
\tau_3\, 2c (H - E_b) \sqrt{H -  \beta^2}\right]_{ij},
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\tilde \psi^+_l(x) =\left\{\begin{array}{cc}
(\lambda - h^-)\tilde\phi^+_l,& 1\leq l \leq i-1,\\
(\lambda - h^-)\tilde\phi^+_{l+1},& i\leq l \leq j-2,\\
(\lambda - h^-)\tilde\phi^+_{l+2},& j-1\leq l \leq N-2,
\end{array}\right.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&& \mp i e^\pm k_N^\pm = \frac12 (k_N^\pm p_{N_1}^\mp -  p_{N_1}^\pm k_N^\mp)k_N^\pm =
b^\pm (h^\pm) k_N^\pm - \tilde{\cal P}_N (h^\pm) p_{N_1}^\pm,\nonumber\\
&& \mp i e^\pm p_{N_1}^\pm = \frac12 (k_N^\pm p_{N_1}^\mp -  p_{N_1}^\pm k_N^\mp) p_{N_1}^\pm =
 \tilde{\cal P}_{N_1} (h^\pm) k_N^\pm -b^\pm (h^\pm) p_{N_1}^\pm.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&& h_{l+1} r_l = r_l h_l;\quad  l = 0,\ldots n-1;\nonumber\\
&&h_l \equiv r_{l-1} r_{l-1}^t + E_{l-1} =
r^t_l r_l +E_l;\quad l = 1,\ldots n-1;\nonumber\\
&&h_0 = r^t_0 r_0 + E_0;\quad h_n = r_{n-1} r_{n-1}^t + E_{n-1},
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&&R_l = r^t_l\ldots r^t_{n-1}\ \partial\ r_{n-1}\ldots r_l;\quad R_n =
\partial;\nonumber\\
&& R_l h_l = h_l R_l;\quad l = 0,\ldots n.
\

(r^\mp_{l+1})^t +
\lambda^\pm_{l+1} \equiv h^\pm_l,\quad l = 1,\ldots,N-1\nonumber\\
